Beautiful Izmir, a city dating back 8,500 years.
A rich cultural texture and tolerance have always been part of these lands.
The fertile land of this city is brought to life by technology and hard work.
Izmir, host of vast investment zones and high-quality industry.
Westernmost point of the east, easternmost point of the west;...
...the beginning and the end of the Silk Road;...
...the city of international trade for thousands of years.
